name: AI Eco System Game
description:
This is a prototype to show off an AI ecosystem idea. The minecarts eat the ore and try to survive.

Controls

  • wasd / arrows - move
  • mouse - look
  • 1 - spawn minecart
  • 2 - spawn ore

The way the behavior tree works.

  1. if a minecart isn't full it is looking for food. 
  2. the more food it eats the stronger and faster it gets
  3. if it has enough energy it tries to reproduce which used food
  4. if it's stomach is empty it starts to starve and will eventually die

The behavior tree

Simulate hunger task

Do Romance task
